rules_text:
When this creature transforms into Ced, Crusader of Wind, you draw two cards and you gain no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.
[i]Wind of Silesse[/i] – Ced's power is equal to the number of cards in your hand.
[i]Galing Magi[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, draw a card for each card in your hand minus seven.
